mapper.select: select file_path as filePath from helloAlz.fileinfo where user_name=#{0} and paper_title=#{1}
mapper.insert: insert into helloAlz.fileinfo (user_name, paper_title, file_path) values (#{userName}, #{paperTitle}, #{filePath});
mapper.update: update helloAlz.fileinfo set file_path=#{2} where user_name=#{0} and paper_title=#{1}
mapper.delete: delete from helloAlz.fileinfo where user_name=#{0} and paper_title=#{1}
